newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Prospective telecom buyer meet Pakistan officials.
newsitem.headline: Prospective telecom buyer meet Pakistan officials.

text.p: Representatives of a Dutch-Indonesian-Pakistani consortium met officials of the Pakistani Privatisation Commission on Wednesday to discuss the sale of the state-run Pakistan Telecommunication Company Ltd (PTCL).

A commission official said the consortium of Pakistan Air Force's business and welfare group Shaheen Foundation, Setdco group of Indonesia and PTT Telecom Netherlands seemed keen in bidding for 26 percent shares of the PTCL.
"They seem to be very keen, we had a very good meeting in which they asked many questions about the PTCL," he said.
Pakistan has not yet announced a date for the bidding.
